label: Output directory
help: Path where your sets will be created (original sets will be left untouched)

label: FbNeo set folder
help: Path to your fbneo set, leave empty if you do not have it

label: Mame2010 set folder
help: Path to your mame2010 set, leave empty if you do not have it

label: Mame2003 set folder
help: Path to your mame2003 set, leave empty if you do not have it

label: Images folder
help: Paths to your images set, leave empty if you do not have it. Separate paths by | they will be used in consecutive order

label: Dry run
help: Set this to 1 to generate only dat and CSV files, no roms will be copied

label: Keep level
help: Roms with working state superior or equals to keepLevel will be kept#n3=WORKING, 2=MOSTLY WORKING, 1=BADLY WORKING, 0=NON WORKING

label: Keep not tested roms
help: Untested roms will be kept (1=Yes, 0=False) even in STRICT mode

label: Exclusion Type
help: Determine how roms are kept if they are in different sets#nSTRICT (only keep the best working one), EQUAL (keep in several sets if equals in both), NONE (keep in all sets)

label: Prefered set
help: General prefered set in STRICT mode if rom is in same working level in several sets. Value can be fbneo, mame2003 or mame2010

label: Use prefered set for genre
help: Use prefered set for genres (1=Yes, 0=False) in STRICT mode and define them. Takes precedence over general prefered set if activated

label: Confirm
help: Your output dir is {outputDir}#nIts content will be erased.#nIf you don't want to proceed, close this window, or click Cancel
